StartText: Note: Please run with administrator permission.
HistoryChoose: Do you want to continue connecting
IP: Please input the address and press Enter:
SecondCheck: If there is any error, please stop program and run again, if not, please press Enter.
AssignError: Parameter error! Please check the 'dist' parameter in 'history. json' is 'auto' or 'manual', and will continue to run according to the automatically assigned IP!
InputGroupName: Please input the group name (group isolation, can't connect if not in the same group)：
ServerText: Please input a server number and press Enter：
ParameterError: Parameter error! Please restart the program!
AssignText: Please select the IP assign method
ConfirmText: Please input a number and press Enter：
AutoUpdateText: Auto update has been skipped! If you want to enable it, please modify the auto_update value in config to True/true!
AutoUpdateConfigError: Config is error! Please make sure the auto_update valve in config to True/true or False/false!
CheckServerListError: Local server list file was not found. If it is used for the first time, please use the 'ServerList_Example.csv' file is manually written to the list and saved as 'LocalServerList.csv'! The list of 'ServerList.csv' will be used to continue running!
